entry.title: iOS-Libaries: cyrius-sasl, libetpan, expat, sksmtpmessage
entry.content:
I published some scripts and modifications to build the following libraries for the iOS-SDK:

  • cyrius-sasl: https://github.com/x2on/cyrus-sasl-ios
  • expat: https://github.com/x2on/expat-ios
  • libetpan: https://github.com/x2on/libetpan
  • sksmtpmessage: https://github.com/x2on/skpsmtpmessage

entry.title: Secure-Mail is ready for download on Apple App Store
entry.content:
Secure-Mail is now ready for purchase on Apple App Store! The review process was sucessfully!

With Secure-Mail you can read and write email encrypted with S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) on iOS (iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch).

You can find more details at www.secure-mail.me

Direct link to Secure-Mail on App Store: Secure-Mail App

entry.title: Secure-Mail: Waiting for Review
entry.content:
With Secure-Mail you can read S/MIME encrypted mails directly from Mail.app and send encrypted S/MIME mails with SMTP.

The Version 1.0 is now submitted to the App Store. Current Status: Waiting for Review

UPDATE 2011-04-28: The App is now ready for download: http://www.x2on.de/2011/04/28/secure-mail-is-ready-for-download-on-apple-app-store/

Thanks for your help at the beta-test.

Some screenshot from the final 1.0:

entry.title: PolarSSL for iOS (iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch)
entry.content:
This is a tutorial for using self-compiled builds of the PolarSSL-library for iOS.

PolarSSL is a light-weight open source cryptographic and SSL/TLS library written in C.

You can build apps with XCode and the official SDK from Apple with this. I also made a small example-app for using the libraries with XCode and the iPhone/iPhone-Simulator. You can also download the precompiled PolarSSL-library (0.14.3).

You can get the scripts and the sourcecode here: https://github.com/x2on/PolarSSL-for-iOS

entry.title: Secure-Mail Beta Test - S/MIME on iOS with OpenSSL (UPDATE #3)
entry.content:
Im searching some people how want's to test Secure-Mail App.

With Secure-Mail you can read S/MIME encrypted mails directly from Mail.app and send encrypted S/MIME mails with SMTP.

Please send me an email with some details about you, and why you wan't test the beta.

2011-04-13: UPDATE #1: The Beta-Test is running now. At this time no new beta-testers are invited. Thanks for your help.

2011-04-24: UPDATE #2: Waiting for review: http://www.x2on.de/2011/04/24/secure-mail-waiting-for-review/

2011-04-28: UPDATE #3 The App is now ready for download: http://www.x2on.de/2011/04/28/secure-mail-is-ready-for-download-on-apple-app-store/

More details about Secure-Mail: http://www.x2on.de/2010/12/06/smime-on-ios-with-openssl-iphoneipad/
